summary: HCSM News ~ How mistrust and fear make fighting Ebola more difficult
title: HCSM News ~ How mistrust and fear make fighting Ebola more difficult
body:
An Ebola outbreak in Congo has killed more than 800 people, and angry locals have attacked aid workers. Canadian doctor Vinh-Kim Nguyen tells us what he saw on an aid mission to the region.



Read more from CBC https://www.cbc.ca/radio/frontburner/how-mistrust-and-fear-make-fighting-ebola-more-difficult-1.5104946?cmp=rss

summary:
So.. went today for a physical (I know people dread this my doctor is pretty cool though)

Did all tests and talked about...
caption:
So.. went today for a physical (I know people dread this my doctor is pretty cool though)

Did all tests and talked about stuff.. at the end he goes Bev you’re in good shape (meaning healthy insides, heart, etc.)

My reply “I’m not surprised”! 🙄🤦🏻‍♀️

However apparently as you get older stuff slows down stupid metabolism 🤬 #absaremadeinkitchen Lifestyle Changes aren’t a quick fix or just when you feel like. Each day the blood is flowing so need to keep those veins flowing

During my workout this morning she goes.. healthy isn’t just feeling good on the outside it’s about doing the things you once couldn’t or feeling strong 💪

It’s never too late to work on YOU! Need a PUSH? Message me by Friday to get in my next Healthy Eating challenge

#TransformationTuesday #selfcare #earthday #health #wellness #coach #nutrition #lifestyle #change #mindset
https://www.instagram.com/p/BwmaphuHQLL/?utm_source=ig_tumblr_share&igshid=1gn90wtoyti4m

summary: Skipping breakfast could be linked to death by heart disease: study
title: Skipping breakfast could be linked to death by heart disease: study
body:
Skipping breakfast could be an important behavioural indicator associated with the risk of death from cardiovascular disease, according to new research published Monday in the Journal of the American College of Cardiology.

Read more from CTV Health News https://www.ctvnews.ca/health/skipping-breakfast-could-be-linked-to-death-by-heart-disease-study-1.4389277

summary: 250+ Examples of Natural Remedies Beating Pharmaceuticals
title: 250+ Examples of Natural Remedies Beating Pharmaceuticals
excerpt: You hear a lot about 'natural healing' these days, but did you know that a sizable body of scientific literature actually supports the idea that natural medicine is safer and more effective than conventional, drug-based medicine?

summary:
UK Local Health & Beauty Weekend Two Night Boot Camp - Health Gift
 Champneys Tring Got Great Health & Beauty Offer: Two Night...
caption:
UK Local Health & Beauty Weekend Two Night Boot Camp - Health Gift

Champneys Tring Got Great Health & Beauty Offer: Two Night Boot Camp for just £589.00

Two nights’ accommodation with breakfast, lunch and dinner included, robe, towel and slippers provided and full use of the facilities. *The boot camp’s holistic approach aims to build healthy relationships with food and exercise. You’ll take part in four to six exercise sessions per day, and with a heavy emphasis on team interaction, activities offer the perfect balance of strength, endurance and stability training – inside and outside of the resort.* **Package inclusions:** – Pre-Arrival support and communication – Welcome talk with blood pressure check – 4-6 hours of exercise per day including indoor/outdoor activities with Boot Camp Instructors to motivate and guide you during the week – Boot Camp Nutrition Menu including breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks and smoothies devised by resident Nutritionists – a Champneys Massage – an Infra-Red Therapy Session – Nutrition and fitness talks Arrival is at 11am, departure is at 4pm. **Dates:** **10th to 12th May** **13th to 15th September** **4th to 6th October**

OFFER PRICE £589.00

Book Now & Save

See Details & Get More Deals at: UK Deals & Sales from Best Shopping Sites

summary: 267 Last-Minute Mother’s Day Gift Ideas  For the Eternal Procrastinators
title: 267 Last-Minute Mother’s Day Gift Ideas  For the Eternal Procrastinators
body:
Everything ships in 5 days or less!

From Woman’s Day

You bought your mom her funny Mother’s Day card weeks ago, but forgot to buy her a Mother’s Day gift. While this may cause you to scramble and stress, it shouldn’t. There are plenty of last-minute Mother’s Day gifts that will get to you before - or by - May 12. True, you probably won’t be able to get a personalized gift made for your mom, but you can still purchase a meaningful gift that she’ll cherish for years to come.

Thanks to Amazon Prime, in-store pickup, or express shipping, shopping for a last-minute Mother’s Day gift is easier than ever. From gardening gloves, to wine box subscriptions, to beauty products, there’s something on this last-minute gift list for every kind of mom. We won’t tell her that you ordered it two days before the holiday unless you do. Just don’t forget to sign the card.

Source: Woman’s Day

Mom Jewelry Dish

Sweet Water Decor

Amazon

$12.99

SHOP NOW

Instead of losing her earrings or favorite necklace, now mom can finally put her jewelry all in one place - a cute dish right on her dresser.

Source: Woman’s Day

Cravings: Hungry for More by Chrissy Teigen

amazon.com

$18.30

SHOP NOW

If Mom loves experimenting in the kitchen, Chrissy Teigen’s second cookbook will be the perfect gift.

Source: Woman’s Day

Billie Razor Subscription

Starting at $9

SHOP NOW

This razor brand made specifically by women and for women will definitely make those self-care days easier for Mom. It’s also a subscription box that you can tailor to how often Mom might need new razors.

Source: Woman’s Day

Deluxe Perfume Sampler

Sephora Favorites

sephora.com

$75.00

SHOP NOW

With this perfume sampler from Sephora, Mom will be able to try some of the most popular fragrances in store. This box also includes a voucher so that she can get her favorite perfume from the box as a full-size.

Source: Woman’s Day

Yes Way Rosé : A Guide to the Pink Wine State of Mind

Readerlink

target.com

$13.52

SHOP NOW

If Mom is a rosé lover, this book is perfect for her. Rosé is not just a type of drink, it’s a way of life.

Source: Woman’s Day

Nespresso Essenza Mini Espresso Machine

DeLonghi

amazon.com

$89.99

SHOP NOW

Make sure Mom starts off her day right with a good cup of espresso coffee. She’ll be forever grateful.

Source: Woman’s Day

Home Spa Gift Basket

LOVERY

amazon.com

$31.99

SHOP NOW

Bring the spa to Mom with this home spa gift basket. It includes a honey and almond shower gel, bubble bath soap, body lotion, bath bomb, bath salts, and a puff.

Source: Woman’s Day

What I Love About Mom Fill-In Book

Knock Knock

Amazon

$10.00

SHOP NOW

Ready for the waterworks to start? After this book arrives, take the time to fill out the heartfelt prompts about what you love most about your mother. She’ll keep this around for years to come and pull it out whenever she needs a smile.

Source: Woman’s Day

Preserved Lavender Roses

Magnificent Roses

1-800-FLOWERS

$250.00

SHOP NOW

Instead of getting mom the traditional last-minute flower bouquet, get her something a little more unique, like these gorgeous roses that can last up to six months. Available in red, pink, and lavender, they come beautifully packed in a hatbox and can be put on display anywhere in her home for months to come.

Source: Woman’s Day

Electric Wine Opener

Ozeri

Amazon

$20.21

SHOP NOW

If you two ever needed an excuse to get together for a wine night, trying out her new electric opener (or other wine-inspired gift) is it. No more yanking out a stubborn cork or fishing broken pieces out of the bottle. This clever tool does all of the hard work for you.

Source: Woman’s Day

Makeup Bag

Vera Bradley

Amazon

$35.00

SHOP NOW

You know that old, concealer-covered bag that holds just about everything in her medicine cabinet? It’s time for it to go. There’s no way she won’t love this Vera Bradley bag that will hold of her favorite products. The best part: If one happens to spill in her case, she can just toss it in the washing machine.

Source: Woman’s Day

HelloFresh Mothers’ Day Box

Starts at $18 per person

SHOP NOW

Have you or your mom thought about trying out a food subscription box, but aren’t exactly sold quite yet? HelloFresh is giving you the opportunity to send mom a brunch or dinner box for Mother’s Day to make her a quality, home-cooked meal. You won’t need to sign up for their subscription, but you can definitely try out some tasty offerings like cinnamon rolls or truffled mashed potatoes.

Source: Woman’s Day

Hand Cream Gift Set

BODY & EARTH

Amazon

$25.99

SHOP NOW

Sometimes it’s not about the gifts she wants, but about the gifts she needs, and who doesn’t need hand lotion? Improve her Mother’s Day by giving soothing creams in a nice set that come in pairs, so she’ll have one for her purse and an extra for desk, car, or drawer at home.

Source: Woman’s Day

Winc Wine Subscription

Starts at $60

SHOP NOW

Give your mother the gift that keeps on giving - literally. Winc is a subscription service that delivers wine to her doorstep each month, and it caters directly to her taste! Maybe she’ll even let you in on a bottle or two if you’re lucky.

Source: Woman’s Day

Rose Quartz Roller

Esmee

Amazon

$19.99

SHOP NOW

Beauty lovers have been eyeing jade rollers for months now. These tools are reported to have anti-aging and soothing qualities if used on the face daily, so Mom will love taking some self-care time to herself every night with her new gifts.

Source: Woman’s Day

Silk Sleep Mask

Slip

Nordstrom

$50.00

Shop Now

After years of staying awake with you at night, she deserves some restful sleep. This comfy silk mask is the perfect way to help her fall asleep at night - and it won’t ruin her hair.

Source: Woman’s Day

Mom Wall Print

printabold

Etsy

$5.80

SHOP NOW

Really in a time crunch? This “Mom” wall art only needs a quick download and a print straight from your at-home printer. Then you can grab a nice frame from the store. This is definitely going up in her hallway (and she won’t even know you did it in all in five minutes).

Source: Woman’s Day

Muse Candle

La Jolie

Amazon

$12.99

Candle

You can’t ever go wrong with a relaxing, nicely-scented candle for Mother’s Day. But a fun, brightly designed candle says you put more thought into her gift and want her to put it on display somewhere in her home.

Source: Woman’s Day

2-Piece Tulip Season Tea Towels

Boston International

Bed, Bath, and Beyond

$16.99

SHOP NOW

Help Mom freshen up her kitchen with a set of brand new tea towels. Whether you go with a springtime floral set to match the season or something that suits her style, she’ll be so happy to finally throw away her ratty old towels that have been sitting in her drawers for ages.

Source: Woman’s Day

Click and Grow Herb Gardening Kit

Click and Grow

Urban Outfitters

$100.00

SHOP NOW

OK, so maybe your mother doesn’t exactly have a green thumb, but she really wants to. Start her out with a Click and Grow gardening kit. It does a lot of the hard work for her and the growing herbs are small enough to sit right in her kitchen.

Source: Woman’s Day

One Line a Day Memory Journal

amazon.com

$11.86

SHOP NOW

If you have a sentimental mom, this One Line a Day memory journal is a sweet way to show that you truly know her. All she has to do is fill out one line of memories a day (it takes about two minutes) for five years. It’s a fun way to see how her life has changed, and it won’t take up an entire bookshelf.

Source: Woman’s Day

“Because I Love You Mom” Bracelet

Alex & Ani

Nordstrom

$32.00

SHOP NOW

Get her a touching accessory that goes with any outfit. This cute, “Because I Love You Mom” charm bracelet comes in silver, gold, or rose gold. So pick out the her favorite type of jewelry tone and she’ll probably never take it off.

Source: Woman’s Day

Wooden Bathtub Caddy

Royal Craft Wood

Amazon

$25.99

SHOP NOW

Mom deserves to live the life of luxury every single day, but a daily spa trip can be just a little expensive. Treat her to a wooden bathtub caddy instead, so she can take an hour to relax without getting bored or worried that she’s going to drop her phone or book in the water. It also has a slot perfect for a wineglass or candle, too!.

Source: Woman’s Day

Stainless Steel Water Bottle

S'well

Amazon

$28.77

SHOP NOW

S'wells keep beverages cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. So if you’ve got a mom that’s on the go - whether it’s to work, the gym, on a hike, or wherever she needs to be - this is going to be her new best friend. And it’s good for the environment.

Source: Woman’s Day

ClassPass Giftcard

Starts at $50

SHOP NOW

If your mom isn’t exactly sure which workout class she wants to try out or if she’s just a workout junkie, give her the gift of ClassPass. This app lets her try out different classes all around her area, ranging from yoga to HITT to cycling. She’s bound to find something she loves.

Source: Woman’s Day

Gardening Gloves

G & F Products

Amazon

$8.62

SHOP NOW

Springtime is here, and that means her flowers are about to bloom. Give her the gift of brand new gardening gloves, so she can get back into the groove of pruning her shrubs and making her garden look as good as new.

Source: Woman’s Day

It’s the gift that never stops giving. A Woman’s Day subscription guarantees a monthly delivery of recipes, crafts, and life tips.

reblog.comment:
Everything ships in 5 days or less!

From Woman’s Day

You bought your mom her funny Mother’s Day card weeks ago, but forgot to buy her a Mother’s Day gift. While this may cause you to scramble and stress, it shouldn’t. There are plenty of last-minute Mother’s Day gifts that will get to you before - or by - May 12. True, you probably won’t be able to get a personalized gift made for your mom, but you can still purchase a meaningful gift that she’ll cherish for years to come.

Thanks to Amazon Prime, in-store pickup, or express shipping, shopping for a last-minute Mother’s Day gift is easier than ever. From gardening gloves, to wine box subscriptions, to beauty products, there’s something on this last-minute gift list for every kind of mom. We won’t tell her that you ordered it two days before the holiday unless you do. Just don’t forget to sign the card.

Source: Woman’s Day

Mom Jewelry Dish

Sweet Water Decor

Amazon

$12.99

SHOP NOW

Instead of losing her earrings or favorite necklace, now mom can finally put her jewelry all in one place - a cute dish right on her dresser.

Source: Woman’s Day

Cravings: Hungry for More by Chrissy Teigen

amazon.com

$18.30

SHOP NOW

If Mom loves experimenting in the kitchen, Chrissy Teigen’s second cookbook will be the perfect gift.

Source: Woman’s Day

Billie Razor Subscription

Starting at $9

SHOP NOW

This razor brand made specifically by women and for women will definitely make those self-care days easier for Mom. It’s also a subscription box that you can tailor to how often Mom might need new razors.

Source: Woman’s Day

Deluxe Perfume Sampler

Sephora Favorites

sephora.com

$75.00

SHOP NOW

With this perfume sampler from Sephora, Mom will be able to try some of the most popular fragrances in store. This box also includes a voucher so that she can get her favorite perfume from the box as a full-size.

Source: Woman’s Day

Yes Way Rosé : A Guide to the Pink Wine State of Mind

Readerlink

target.com

$13.52

SHOP NOW

If Mom is a rosé lover, this book is perfect for her. Rosé is not just a type of drink, it’s a way of life.

Source: Woman’s Day

Nespresso Essenza Mini Espresso Machine

DeLonghi

amazon.com

$89.99

SHOP NOW

Make sure Mom starts off her day right with a good cup of espresso coffee. She’ll be forever grateful.

Source: Woman’s Day

Home Spa Gift Basket

LOVERY

amazon.com

$31.99

SHOP NOW

Bring the spa to Mom with this home spa gift basket. It includes a honey and almond shower gel, bubble bath soap, body lotion, bath bomb, bath salts, and a puff.

Source: Woman’s Day

What I Love About Mom Fill-In Book

Knock Knock

Amazon

$10.00

SHOP NOW

Ready for the waterworks to start? After this book arrives, take the time to fill out the heartfelt prompts about what you love most about your mother. She’ll keep this around for years to come and pull it out whenever she needs a smile.

Source: Woman’s Day

Preserved Lavender Roses

Magnificent Roses

1-800-FLOWERS

$250.00

SHOP NOW

Instead of getting mom the traditional last-minute flower bouquet, get her something a little more unique, like these gorgeous roses that can last up to six months. Available in red, pink, and lavender, they come beautifully packed in a hatbox and can be put on display anywhere in her home for months to come.

Source: Woman’s Day

Electric Wine Opener

Ozeri

Amazon

$20.21

SHOP NOW

If you two ever needed an excuse to get together for a wine night, trying out her new electric opener (or other wine-inspired gift) is it. No more yanking out a stubborn cork or fishing broken pieces out of the bottle. This clever tool does all of the hard work for you.

Source: Woman’s Day

Makeup Bag

Vera Bradley

Amazon

$35.00

SHOP NOW

You know that old, concealer-covered bag that holds just about everything in her medicine cabinet? It’s time for it to go. There’s no way she won’t love this Vera Bradley bag that will hold of her favorite products. The best part: If one happens to spill in her case, she can just toss it in the washing machine.

Source: Woman’s Day

HelloFresh Mothers’ Day Box

Starts at $18 per person

SHOP NOW

Have you or your mom thought about trying out a food subscription box, but aren’t exactly sold quite yet? HelloFresh is giving you the opportunity to send mom a brunch or dinner box for Mother’s Day to make her a quality, home-cooked meal. You won’t need to sign up for their subscription, but you can definitely try out some tasty offerings like cinnamon rolls or truffled mashed potatoes.

Source: Woman’s Day

Hand Cream Gift Set

BODY & EARTH

Amazon

$25.99

SHOP NOW

Sometimes it’s not about the gifts she wants, but about the gifts she needs, and who doesn’t need hand lotion? Improve her Mother’s Day by giving soothing creams in a nice set that come in pairs, so she’ll have one for her purse and an extra for desk, car, or drawer at home.

Source: Woman’s Day

Winc Wine Subscription

Starts at $60

SHOP NOW

Give your mother the gift that keeps on giving - literally. Winc is a subscription service that delivers wine to her doorstep each month, and it caters directly to her taste! Maybe she’ll even let you in on a bottle or two if you’re lucky.

Source: Woman’s Day

Rose Quartz Roller

Esmee

Amazon

$19.99

SHOP NOW

Beauty lovers have been eyeing jade rollers for months now. These tools are reported to have anti-aging and soothing qualities if used on the face daily, so Mom will love taking some self-care time to herself every night with her new gifts.

Source: Woman’s Day

Silk Sleep Mask

Slip

Nordstrom

$50.00

Shop Now

After years of staying awake with you at night, she deserves some restful sleep. This comfy silk mask is the perfect way to help her fall asleep at night - and it won’t ruin her hair.

Source: Woman’s Day

Mom Wall Print

printabold

Etsy

$5.80

SHOP NOW

Really in a time crunch? This “Mom” wall art only needs a quick download and a print straight from your at-home printer. Then you can grab a nice frame from the store. This is definitely going up in her hallway (and she won’t even know you did it in all in five minutes).

Source: Woman’s Day

Muse Candle

La Jolie

Amazon

$12.99

Candle

You can’t ever go wrong with a relaxing, nicely-scented candle for Mother’s Day. But a fun, brightly designed candle says you put more thought into her gift and want her to put it on display somewhere in her home.

Source: Woman’s Day

2-Piece Tulip Season Tea Towels

Boston International

Bed, Bath, and Beyond

$16.99

SHOP NOW

Help Mom freshen up her kitchen with a set of brand new tea towels. Whether you go with a springtime floral set to match the season or something that suits her style, she’ll be so happy to finally throw away her ratty old towels that have been sitting in her drawers for ages.

Source: Woman’s Day

Click and Grow Herb Gardening Kit

Click and Grow

Urban Outfitters

$100.00

SHOP NOW

OK, so maybe your mother doesn’t exactly have a green thumb, but she really wants to. Start her out with a Click and Grow gardening kit. It does a lot of the hard work for her and the growing herbs are small enough to sit right in her kitchen.

Source: Woman’s Day

One Line a Day Memory Journal

amazon.com

$11.86

SHOP NOW

If you have a sentimental mom, this One Line a Day memory journal is a sweet way to show that you truly know her. All she has to do is fill out one line of memories a day (it takes about two minutes) for five years. It’s a fun way to see how her life has changed, and it won’t take up an entire bookshelf.

Source: Woman’s Day

“Because I Love You Mom” Bracelet

Alex & Ani

Nordstrom

$32.00

SHOP NOW

Get her a touching accessory that goes with any outfit. This cute, “Because I Love You Mom” charm bracelet comes in silver, gold, or rose gold. So pick out the her favorite type of jewelry tone and she’ll probably never take it off.

Source: Woman’s Day

Wooden Bathtub Caddy

Royal Craft Wood

Amazon

$25.99

SHOP NOW

It also has a slot perfect for a wineglass or candle, too!.

All she has to do is fill out one line of memories a day (it takes about two minutes) for five years. It’s a fun way to see how her life has changed, and it won’t take up an entire bookshelf.

Source: Woman’s Day

“Because I Love You Mom” Bracelet

Alex & Ani

Nordstrom

$32.00

SHOP NOW

Get her a touching accessory that goes with any outfit. This cute, “Because I Love You Mom” charm bracelet comes in silver, gold, or rose gold. So pick out the her favorite type of jewelry tone and she’ll probably never take it off.

Source: Woman’s Day

Wooden Bathtub Caddy

Royal Craft Wood

Amazon

$25.99

SHOP NOW

Mom deserves to live the life of luxury every single day, but a daily spa trip can be just a little expensive. Treat her to a wooden bathtub caddy instead, so she can take an hour to relax without getting bored or worried that she’s going to drop her phone or book in the water. It also has a slot perfect for a wineglass or candle, too!.

Source: Woman’s Day

Stainless Steel Water Bottle

S'well

Amazon

$28.77

SHOP NOW

S'wells keep beverages cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. So if you’ve got a mom that’s on the go - whether it’s to work, the gym, on a hike, or wherever she needs to be - this is going to be her new best friend. And it’s good for the environment.

Source: Woman’s Day

ClassPass Giftcard

Starts at $50

SHOP NOW

If your mom isn’t exactly sure which workout class she wants to try out or if she’s just a workout junkie, give her the gift of ClassPass. This app lets her try out different classes all around her area, ranging from yoga to HITT to cycling. She’s bound to find something she loves.

Source: Woman’s Day

Gardening Gloves

G & F Products

Amazon

$8.62

SHOP NOW

Springtime is here, and that means her flowers are about to bloom. Give her the gift of brand new gardening gloves, so she can get back into the groove of pruning her shrubs and making her garden look as good as new.

Source: Woman’s Day

Woman’s Day Magazine Subscription

Woman’s Day

Woman’s Day

$6.99

Shop Now

It’s the gift that never stops giving. A Woman’s Day subscription guarantees a monthly delivery of recipes, crafts, and life tips.

Source: Woman’s Day

summary: Italy To Open Investigation Into All-Female Court’s Ruling Finding Victim Too Ugly To Be Raped Italy’s Justice Ministry will...
caption: Italy To Open Investigation Into All-Female Court’s Ruling Finding Victim Too Ugly To Be Raped Italy’s Justice Ministry will investigate a court’s 2017 ruling acquitting two men of rape convictions after it found the victim was too ugly to be a credible witness.

summary: Which Joints Does Gout Affect?
title: Which Joints Does Gout Affect?
body:
Gout most frequently affects the joint at the base of the big toe and is an extremely painful form of arthritis.

Which Joints Does Gout Affect?
